about_the_game:
Cards, machines and engineers? Everything you need to build a factory is here!

Factory Planner is a card-based strategy/simulation game. By linking cards together, you can extract resources, manufacture, and manage the efficiency of your factory. Machines aren't the only way to industrialize a planet! You can assign engineers to specialties, send them out to explore, or use them to tame grumpy aliens. Start with wood and iron and build factories to advance to the nuclear age!

In this process, you must calculate the machines, manage resources correctly, and protect your factory from impending dangers. Although building an efficient factory may seem tiring, production lines that do not pause make everyone happy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 (Version 1909 or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (2048 MB) / AMD Radeon RX 470 (2048 MB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 (Version 1909 or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (2048 MB) / AMD Radeon RX 470 (2048 MB)

short_description: Factory Planner is a card-based simulation/strategy game that lets you build a factory using cards. The main goal of the game is to make combinations with different cards so that each player can build different factories and feel the sandbox experience to the fullest.
